      Returns:
      The extracted sub-array.

    • createTimestamp

      public static Instant createTimestamp()
      Creates a timestamp that, if the global time modifier is set, will modify the timestamp accordingly. If no modifier is set, then the current local time, in UTC, will be captured.
      Returns:
      An Instant timestamp

    • gracefulTimestampCompare

      public static int gracefulTimestampCompare​(Instant baseTime, Instant otherTime)
      Will, if Dime.getGracePeriod() returns a value different from 0, compare two Instant instances using a grace period. A lower and upper boundary will be calculated from the base time given, the size of this period will be based on the grace period. The result given back will be equal to Instant.compareTo(Instant). If no grace is set (0), then the two Instant objects will be compared directly.
      Parameters:
      baseTime - The base time to compare a second Instant instance with.
      otherTime - The Instant instance to compare against the given base time.
      Returns:
      Negative if less, positive is greater, or 0 if the same or within the grace period.
